nodes.text: A Khormai village on the planet Khorm was decimated during the Clone Wars when the Khormai warlord Unger Gout unleashed the power of his weather-control station to stop the Galactic Republic from reaching his base and stopping his agrocite-mining slavery ring. When the Khormai resistance leader Adaroo discovered the village while leading a group of Jedi to Gout's location, he insisted on burying the dead Khormai he found there before continuing.
